title: Manufacturing
overview: Reviewing the end-to-end manufacturing process is key to measuring and reducing Scope 1 GHG emissions and conserving natural resources. A methodology framework is provided with technology serving as an enabler for process optimization.

solutions.title: Implement Sustainable Supply Chain Manufacturing Method - INTERMEDIATE
solutions.description: Minimizes waste through adoption of practices affecting product design, process design, and operational principles. Production engineers and factory planners identify improvement measures.
key_focus_areas: Basic principles: Pollution Prevention, toxic substance reduction, Design for Environment (DfE)
Green waste management: solid waste, hazardous waste, air emissions, wastewater
Tool-based methods: LCA, DfE, end-of-life strategies
Product design emphasis on scrap reduction

solutions.title: Integrate Lean Manufacturing with Green Manufacturing - INTERMEDIATE
solutions.description: Combines Lean Manufacturing's efficiency focus with Green Manufacturing's environmental objectives. Both approaches aim to 'minimise non-value added activities with a focus on waste reduction.'
key_elements: Lean Manufacturing eliminates seven wastes: transport, inventory, motion, waiting, over-processing, over-production
Green Manufacturing extends this with environmental and social impact reduction
ISO 14001:2015 serves as systematic continuous improvement framework
Enhanced when unified and implemented simultaneously

solutions.title: Implement Cleaner Production - INTERMEDIATE
solutions.description: Prevention-focused approach emphasizing efficient resource use over end-of-pipe solutions. Core principle: produce while reducing pollution, emissions, and waste.
focus_areas: Conservation of water, energy, raw materials
Reduction of emission quantity and toxicity before process exit
business_benefits: Improved public relations and market competitiveness

solutions.title: Adopt Health and Safety Modules - INTERMEDIATE
solutions.description: Protects worker safety, health, and welfare as vital organizational resources. Sustainable organizations balance 'the triple bottom line of people, planet, and profit.'
benefits: Reduced workers' compensation and recruitment costs

solutions.title: Optimize Manufacturing Through Emerging Technologies - ADVANCED
solutions.description: Digital capabilities boost productivity, workplace safety, and cost reduction while providing visibility into production, equipment maintenance, and energy usage.
